Package assignment2.problem2

Class Locker

java.lang.Object
assignment2.problem2.Locker
public class Locker extends Object
This is a Locker class which represent a locker object with a max width, a max height, a max depth and a mail item storing in the locker.

  • Constructor Details

    • Locker

      public Locker(Integer maxWidth, Integer maxHeight, Integer maxDepth) throws InvalidSizeException
      Constructor for locker object with specific max width, max height, max depth and mail item. When a locker is first created, the mail item is null.
      Parameters:
      maxWidth - - A maximum width in inches, an integer greater than or equal to 1
      maxHeight - - A maximum height in inches, an integer greater than or equal to 1
      maxDepth - - A maximum depth in inches, an integer greater than or equal to 1
      Throws:
      InvalidSizeException - when any of the maxWidth, maxHeight, maxDepth smaller than 1.

  • Method Details

    • addMail

      public void addMail(MailItem mail) throws OccupiedException, ExceedsSizeException
      Store a mail in a locker
      Parameters:
      mail - - the mail item is added into the locker, MailItem class
      Throws:
      OccupiedException - when the mail item is not Null.
      ExceedsSizeException - when the mail item exceeds the dimensions of the locker

    • pickupMail

      public MailItem pickupMail(Recipient recipient) throws EmptyException, MismatchException
      Remove and return the mail item from the locker with given recipient
      Parameters:
      recipient - - recipient who is going to pick up the mail, Recipient class.
      Returns:
      the mail item matching the recipient from the locker
      Throws:
      EmptyException - when the mail item is null.(The locker is empty.)
      MismatchException - when the recipient mismatches the recipient of the mail item.

      the max width of the locker. Integer.
